projects.title: Tip calculator app
projects.details: A frontend mentor challenge, this small app is perfect for anyone starting to get to grips with JavaScript. The calculator functionality will be a nice test!

projects.title: Multistep form
projects.details: Had some fun with this one and took advantage of Framer-motions's layout prop o make the nav indicators' animation responsive.

projects.title: Rest Countries Browser
projects.details: Bit of a doozy implementing this. I tried to step as far out of my comfort zone as possible and shipped a bare bones (by my standards) responsive frontend app
